app.title: HOOQ.TV
app.description: Your gateway to a world of unlimited entertainment. Access over 30,000 hours of premium Hollywood and local movies/TV series right at your fingertips.

downloadApp.welcomeText: Get the app to start watching

pageNotFound.title: 404 - Page not found
pageNotFound.detail: It’s not the page that’s missing, but the page that’s there that defines me.

updateFooter.reloadApp: A new update for HOOQ is available!

ctaFooter.signUpText: Your first month is free if you get a monthly plan!

offlineInfoFooter.text: Oops, looks like you’re offline. Please check your connection.

SG-PAID30-RECUR-OTT-CC.title: 30-day free trial
SG-PAID30-RECUR-OTT-CC.item1: Includes 1 hot and fresh movie rental ticket every month!
SG-PAID30-RECUR-OTT-CC.item3: SGD8.98 per month after trial ends

geoLock.sorryWeAre: Sorry, we’re currently not available in your region.

content.tenThousand: 10,000 movies and TV series for the price of 1!
content.largestSelection: Largest selection of the best of local and Hollywood hits.
content.rentLatest: Rent latest movies fresh from the cinemas.
content.anywhereAnytime: Anywhere, anytime, on any device and download for offline viewing.
content.unlimtedEntertainment: Unlimited entertainment on up to 5 devices.
